[[File:BatteriesIncluded.jpg|right]]
'''Batteries Included''' was a [[computer software]] and [[computer hardware|hardware]] company based in the [[Toronto]] area. It was well known in the 1980s for its popular [[PaperClip]] [[word processor]], which was available for [[Atari]] and [[Commodore International|Commodore]] microcomputers.
'''Batteries Included''' was a [[computer software]] and [[computer hardware|hardware]] company based in the [[Toronto]] area. It was well known in the 1980s for its popular [[PaperClip]] [[word processor]], which was available for [[Atari]] and [[Commodore International|Commodore]] microcomputers.
